## Overview

You don’t create a menu builder object. Instead, you override [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIResponder/buildMenu(with:)] in your app delegate or view controller to receive a builder object. Where you override this method determines the system that the builder updates. To add and remove menus from the menu bar using the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIMenuSystem/main] menu system, override [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIResponder/buildMenu(with:)] in your app delegate. To build a context menu using the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIMenuSystem/context] system, override the method in your view controller.

To see an example of how to use a menu builder object, see [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/adding-menus-and-shortcuts-to-the-menu-bar-and-user-interface].

# UIMenuBuilder

**Protocol**

An interface for adding and removing menus from a menu system.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor protocol UIMenuBuilder
```

## Overview

You don’t create a menu builder object. Instead, you override [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIResponder/buildMenu(with:)] in your app delegate or view controller to receive a builder object. Where you override this method determines the system that the builder updates. To add and remove menus from the menu bar using the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIMenuSystem/main] menu system, override [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIResponder/buildMenu(with:)] in your app delegate. To build a context menu using the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIMenuSystem/context] system, override the method in your view controller.

To see an example of how to use a menu builder object, see [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/adding-menus-and-shortcuts-to-the-menu-bar-and-user-interface].

## Getting menu systems and elements

- **system**: The menu system that the menu builder modifies.
- **menu(for:)**: Gets the menu for the specified menu identifier.
- **action(for:)**: Gets the action for the specified action identifier.
- **command(for:propertyList:)**: Gets the command for the specified selector and property list.

## Inserting child menus

- **insertChild(_:atStartOfMenu:)**: Adds a child menu as the first element of the specified parent menu.
- **insertChild(_:atEndOfMenu:)**: Adds a child menu as the last element of the specified parent menu.

## Inserting sibling menus

- **insertSibling(_:beforeMenu:)**: Inserts a sibling menu before the specified menu.
- **insertSibling(_:afterMenu:)**: Inserts a sibling menu after the specified menu.

## Replacing menus and child menu elements

- **replaceChildren(ofMenu:from:)**: Replaces the elements in a menu with the elements returned by the specified handler block.

## Removing a menu

- **remove(menu:)**: Removes a menu from the menu system.

## Instance Methods

- **insertElements(_:afterAction:)**: Insert elements after an identified action.
- **insertElements(_:afterCommand:propertyList:)**
- **insertElements(_:afterMenu:)**: Insert elements after an identified menu.
- **insertElements(_:atEndOfMenu:)**: Insert elements at the end of an identified parent menu.
- **insertElements(_:atStartOfMenu:)**: Insert elements at the start of an identified parent menu.
- **insertElements(_:beforeAction:)**: Insert elements before an identified action.
- **insertElements(_:beforeCommand:propertyList:)**
- **insertElements(_:beforeMenu:)**: Insert elements before an identified menu.
- **remove(action:)**: Remove an identified action.
- **remove(command:propertyList:)**
- **replace(action:with:)**: Replace an identified action with menu elements.
- **replace(command:propertyList:with:)**
- **replace(menu:with:)**: Replace an identified menu with menu elements.
- **replace(menu:with:)**: Replace an identified menu with a menu.

## App menus

- **UIMenu**: A container for grouping related menu elements in an app menu or contextual menu.
- **UIMenuSystem**: An object representing a main or contextual menu system.
- **UIMainMenuSystem**: The main menu system.
